name: FluffleBut Saves The Earth Cats
description:
Submission for 2019 Epic game jam.  Completed in 4 days.

Play as the proud space cat Private FluffleBut and take part in a mission to liberate the cats of earth from 3 tyranical humans. This game is complete with totaly unique boss music, not realistic space flight, and epic tail physics.

The game has 3 levels, each level has 3 collectible cats and a boss fight. Cats meow randomly so see if you can get all 9 meows. Your kitty collection is viewable at the main menu.

This project was way to ambitous for the time I had so please let me know if any bugs are found so I can fix them later.
